divs: sighting detailsi was living at my parents home at the time, and attending computer school during the day and delivering food at night. so i would come home at night and eat and study. and as i enjoyed cigars i would go out side after words to have a cigar each night. i stepped out to have a cigar, i just looked up as i usually do and saw a object spinning in a clock wise way. it was almost directly over my head. it was very bright white light. it was spinning really fast in a wobble type fashion. it was at arms length about ,1\2 the size of a dime. i remember i could not believe what i was seeing, it was moving faster than anything i know of here on earth. i had forgotten my lighter just a few feet inside the door of the patio, i went in to grab it and came back out in a few seconds and it was still there. spinning, i remember being filled with a great feeling of excitement. i was alone though..my elderly parents where asleep in side. i decided i had to find some one to help me witness this. i went in and shouted to my mother and father. they were fast asleep. i came back out it was there still. i grabbed my cigar and just stared at this fantastic thing. it was at this time that it began to move out of its spinning circle and started to fly in a south western direction. it was moving very fast, it was at this point that as i followed it heading up and away that it must have been up pretty high because i feel it was being illuminated by the sun the whole while. i followed it as it became dimmer and smaller and head toward a arching direction into outer space and then it was gone from my sight. this object was insight for well over five minutes to my best estimation. it was a bright white light, i would think metal or made of some shinning properties, it was disk or round shaped. it was spinning and wobbling in a way that it looked very different than any craft i had every seen. regards
Summary: Witnessed a spinning Bright White object.
